de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.jsmap
Class JSONBuffer

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.jsmap.JSONBuffer

public class JSONBuffer
extends Object

Helper class to produce JSON output. Try hard to ensure validity of the output.
